login.title: Enter your information below to begin tracking patients you test for Ebola.
login.notes: Notes to share with government health team (e.g. your location, credentials, etc.)

details.patientNotes: CHW notes for patient (Shared with government workers)

photoCapture.error: There was an error capturing the photo, please try again

cameraPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your camera to record patient test results.
cameraPermissions.title: Camera Permission Required
cameraPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's camera is required. To continue, please update your device settings.
cameraPermissions.whereUpdate: Go to Settings > Apps > EVT Track > Permissions.
cameraPermissions.howUpdate: Toggle the Camera switch to on.

locationPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your location so it can accurately report patient data.
locationPermissions.title: Location Permission Required
locationPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's location is required. To continue, please update your device settings.
locationPermissions.whereUpdate: Go to Settings > Apps > EVT Track > Permissions.
locationPermissions.howUpdate: Toggle the Location switch to on.
